name: Tempo (YGD version)
description:
This game was originally developed as part of the BAFTA YGD 2019 Game Making Award, age category 15-18. If you are in the UK and are age 10-18, please consider checking out this initiative!

Created by Harry Petch and Louis Jackson, this game develops on the FunkSynk prototype from the GMTK Jam 2018.

Tempo is a top-down shooter where the player has no control over when they shoot their gun: it automatically fires, influenced by the current music track playing, which differs depending on which area you are in!

You can read more about the game here!

The music is all custom made for this game by Louis Jackson. He's really good at it.
